comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: On the left, Prince Heinrich, Kaiser Wilhelm II's brother en.wikipedia.org/wiki/P rince_Henry_of_Prussia_(1862-1929) on the right, the Kaiser's son Crown Prince Wilhelm en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William,_German_Crown_Prince

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This is a detail from a postcard "Besuch des Prinzen Heinrich im Hauptquartier des Kronprinzen" (Visit of Prince Henry in the headquarter of the Crown Prince)

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Good catch! Here, from another Flickr user, is the next postcard in the series, a closeup of the two at the same site: www.flickr.com/photos/bismarckstiftung/7830899284/ And a clearer capture of the card that Bain cropped above: static3.akpool.de/images/cards/56/563994.jpg

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for your excellent research. We'll fill in a bit of the information the next time we update.
